bibl.title: Emerald Mining in Roman and Byzantine Egypt
bibl.note: University College London - University of Cambridge, preliminary survey of the Sikait-Zubara region in the Eastern Desert between Myos Hormos and Berenice. The emeralds began to be quarried on a large scale in the Late Roman and Byzantine period.
bibl.seg: SHAW Ian, Judith BUNBURY and Robert JAMESON, Emerald Mining in Roman and Byzantine Egypt.

University College London - University of Cambridge, preliminary survey of the Sikait-Zubara region in the Eastern Desert between Myos Hormos and Berenice. The emeralds began to be quarried on a large scale in the Late Roman and Byzantine period.
